document_name: Royal Decrees No. 163/2014 and No 1.007/2015 on carbon footprint, compensation and carbon dioxide absorption
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/ESP/2014/ESP-2014-03-29-Royal Decrees No. 163_2014 and No 1.007_2015 on carbon footprint, compensation and carbon dioxide absorption_b8cb8200e9933e5b856d4d4362c2c0f4.pdf
document_description: The purpose of this Royal Decree is to create carbon footprint, compensation and carbon dioxide (CO2) absorption projects. The creation of the registry aims to contribute to the reduction at the national level of greenhouse gas emissions to increase the absorption by carbon sinks in the national territory and to facilitate in this way the fulfilment of Spain's international commitments.
